ApplicationFormParticipant.name: ApplicationFormParticipant
ApplicationFormParticipant.description: Represents information about the application form participant.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form associated with the participant.

Comments.description: The additional information about the participant.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the application form participant is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the application form participant record.

ParticipantId.description: The participant that's associated with the application form.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The default access level for a role that a participant can have in the context of a parent record.
